rows.dockerfile:
FROM abcsys.cn:5000/public/centos-jdk:v5
RUN echo 'nameserver   10.250.70.245' >> /etc/resolv.conf
ADD ./ccm/base-bosent-credit/credit/target/credit-161102-08-dev-executable.jar /opt/
ADD  ./ccm_conf/ccm/start_shell/simsun.ttf  /usr/local/java/jdk/jre/lib/fonts/simsun.ttf
ADD ./ccm_conf/ccm/datavalidation  /opt/
ADD ./ccm_conf/ccm/start_shell/ccm_uat.sh      /opt/sh/
ADD ./ccm_conf/ccm/start_shell/arthas-boot/arthas-boot.jar /opt/sh/
ENV LC_ALL zh_CN.UTF-8
ENV LANG zh_CN.UTF-8
WORKDIR /opt/sh/
CMD ./ccm_uat.sh

cd $WORKSPACE/cip/
git checkout  uat
cd $WORKSPACE/cip/cip/
mvn clean install
cd $WORKSPACE/
if  [ ! -d  cip_conf ];
then
    mkdir  cip_conf
fi
rm -rf  $WORKSPACE/cip_conf/*
cd  $WORKSPACE/cip_conf/
git clone http://jenknis:11111111@192.168.11.190/cheryfs_conf/cip.git
cd  $WORKSPACE
if [  -f   cip-main.jar   ]  ||  [  -d  config  ]
then
  \rm     cip-main.jar
  \rm  -rf  config
fi
mv  cip/cip/cip-main/target/cip-main.jar   ./
mv  cip_conf/cip/datavalidation/config   ./
chmod  -R  775 *
if [ -f  springcloud-cip.tar  ]
then
\rm  springcloud-cip.tar
fi
tar cvf  springcloud-cip.tar   cip-main.jar  config","poll_scheduled_unit":"m","analysisProperties":"sonar.projectKey=ci-cip-20190730092922

rows.dockerfile:
FROM   abcsys.cn:5000/public/nginx-sp:v1
RUN mkdir -p /etc/nginx/logs/
ADD ./nginx-fep/AITeller-ng/dist /home/web/AITeller_ng/dist
ADD    ./nginx_conf/nginx/uat/nginx.conf /etc/nginx/
ADD ./nginx_conf/nginx/uat/ssl/_.cheryfs.cn.key   /etc/nginx/videoCheckKey/
ADD ./nginx_conf/nginx/uat/ssl/_.cheryfs.cn.crt /etc/nginx/videoCheckKey/
ADD ./nginx_conf/nginx/uat/cheryConfig.js /home/web/AITeller_ng/dist/assets/config/
RUN chmod 775 /home/web/AITeller_ng/dist/assets/config/cheryConfig.js

rows.dockerfile:
FROM abcsys.cn:5000/public/cps:v1
ENV  JAVA_HOME=/usr/local/openjdk-8
RUN mv  /etc/localtime /etc/localtime.bak && ln -s /usr/share/zoneinfo/Asia/Shanghai  /etc/localtime
RUN  export PATH=$PATH:$JAVA_HOME/bin
RUN  rm -rf /usr/local/tomcat/bin/bof-config.xml
RUN  rm  -rf  /usr/local/tomcat/bof-config.xml
ADD ./cps_conf/cps/datavalidation/bof-config.xml  /usr/local/tomcat/bin/
ADD ./cps_conf/cps/datavalidation/bof-config.xml  /usr/local/tomcat/
ADD ./cps_conf/cps/datavalidation/runtimelib  /usr/local/tomcat/bin/
ADD ./cps_conf/cps/datavalidation/catalina.sh  /usr/local/tomcat/bin/
RUN chmod +x  /usr/local/tomcat/bin/catalina.sh
RUN  rm -rf  /usr/local/tomcat/webapps/etlplus.war
ADD  ./cps/cpsMain/etlplus/target/etlplus.war   /usr/local/tomcat/webapps/etlplus.war
ADD  ./cps/cpsMain/scheduler/target/scheduler.war  /usr/local/tomcat/webapps/scheduler.war
RUN  cp  -r  /usr/local/tomcat/bioffice.properties   /
RUN  cp  -r  /usr/local/tomcat/bioffice.properties  /usr/local/tomcat/bin/
WORKDIR /usr/local/tomcat/bin/
CMD ./catalina.sh run

ADD ./cps-agent-shell/cpsAgent  /opt/cps-agent-shell

ENV LC_ALL zh_CN.UTF-8

WORKDIR /opt/cps-agent-shell/agent/
CMD ./start.sh

rows.dockerfile:
FROM abcsys.cn:5000/public/centos-jdk:v05
ADD ./dmpt/base-bosent-dmpt/dmpt/target/dmpt-161102-08-dev-executable.jar /opt/
ADD ./dmpt_conf/dmpt/uat  /opt/
ADD  ./dmpt_conf/dmpt/start_shell/dmpt.sh  /opt/sh/
ENV LC_ALL zh_CN.UTF-8
ENV LANG zh_CN.UTF-8
WORKDIR /opt/sh
CMD ./dmpt.sh
